descript.abstract: MODIS NDVI data was extracted from MODIS product type MOD13Q1. MODIS/Terra Vegetation Indices 16-Day L3 Global 250m covers Central Kenya. Data was caputred on 2008-07-27.
descript.purpose: To study vegetation indices of area around Mpala Research Center, Kenya.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.0 (Build 6000) ; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

procstep.procdesc: MODIS/TERRA vegetation indices 16-day L3 global 250m sin grid v005 data was downloaded from the NASA EOS Data Gateway site. This data was in HDF file format. The ERDAS IMAGINE 9.1 software was used to import data as MODIS EOS HDF Format and later 250m 16 days NDVI was selected as field to import the data. Data was originally in World Sinusoidal projection with WGS84 and was later reprojected to Arc 1960 UTM Zone 37S.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

cntaddr.addrtype: Digital Map and Geospatial Information Center

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.0 (Build 6000) ; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770
